dc.title: U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command (TRADOC) -- Victory Starts Here!
dc.description: The U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command (TRADOC) recruits, trains and educates the Army's Soldiers; develops leaders; supports training in units; develops doctrine; establishes standards; and builds the future Army.
